chess

Class Chess

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Chess

  • public class Chess
extends java.lang.Object
    Chess class begins the game of chess.
    Author:
    Capki Kim, Daoun Oh

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method starts the game. During the game, if there are special events such as resign, draw, check, checkmate, and pawn promotion, it is caught in this method. Also identifies illegal moves or input, and if a piece catches another piece. Lastly, identifies the winner of the game.
        Parameters:
        args - any command line arguments

      • checkInput

        public static int checkInput(java.lang.String input)
        Method to check whether user input is correctly formatted. Identifies resign and a draw, and invalid moves.
        Parameters:
        input - two sets of positions
        Returns:
        4 player resigns from the game,

        3 player accepts the draw,

        2 player offers to end the game in a draw,

        1 valid input,

        0 invalid input

      • checkAlpha

        public static boolean checkAlpha(char ch)
        Checks if input value for file is correct
        Parameters:
        ch - input file value
        Returns:
        true if value is valid (between a-h) false otherwise

      • checkDigit

        public static boolean checkDigit(int digit)
        Checks if input value for rank is correct
        Parameters:
        digit - input rank value
        Returns:
        true if value is valid (between 1-8) false otherwise

      • translate

        public static int translate(int i)
        Translate user input rank value to corresponding coordinates on the board
        Parameters:
        i - input rank value
        Returns:
        translated rank value

      • translate

        public static int translate(char c)
        Translate user input file value to corresponding coordinates on the board
        Parameters:
        c - input file value
        Returns:
        translated file value

      • checkPawnPromotion

        public static boolean checkPawnPromotion(char c)
        Checks if player indicated a valid promotion
        Parameters:
        c - requested promotion
        Returns:
        true if requested promotion is valid,

        false otherwise

      • printError

        public static void printError(java.lang.String team)
        Prints the error message for an illegal move
        Parameters:
        team - indicates what team created the error
